root.name: Alice no Paint Adventure
root.description: Overview In Alice no Paint Adventure, there are three game play modes. In Story Mode, threre are passwords for the levels, and an hour long movie of Alice in Wonderland can be viewed. To understand the game, players have to fluent in both English and Japanese. There are also three arcade games. The games are Painting the Roses Red, Whack a Charachter, and a memory game. In Paint Mode, players cna have a full palette of colors and the ability to mix them. There is also an eraser, a spray tool, and a 256-color spectrum board to paint on.
